    Roadmap

    1. Get all the exercises working in 2.1 release
    2. Migrate all exercises to Robotics-Academy 2.3 release
      • Drone exercises
    3. Develop new exercises
      • map building: occupancy grid
      • localization algorithm with particle filter and laser sensor
      • Computer Vision exercises
    4. Improve RADI for ROS1-Noetic and ROS2-Foxy

    Coming soon exercises

    The following exercises are work in progress, the will soon be included in the platform. Stay tuned!

    Autoparking

    (Update pending) Logic of a navigation algorithm for an automated vehicle.

    Bump and go

    (Update pending) Basic behaviour of bump-spin using a finite state machine.

    Follow Face

    (Update pending) Detect people faces and follow them through a camera.

    Laser-based localization

    (Update pending) Robot self-localization using particle filter and laser sensor

    Qualifying Formula1

    (Update pending) Complete a lap to the Nürburgring circuit as fast as it can.
